p: The plant and its rhizomes were collected from Rimi village of Chankheli Rural municipality, Humla District, Karnali Province of Nepal (29°07′52“N and 82°30’50”E) in August 2018 and identified in Nepal National Herbarium and Plant Laboratory (KATH) Godhawori, Lalitpur, Nepal with reference letter number of 2074/2075–230.
